alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Gibson; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 6:29PM CDT until May 15 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Gibson County in west Tennessee... Southwestern Carroll County in west Tennessee... North central Madison County in west Tennessee... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Trenton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Humboldt, Milan, Trenton, Bradford, Atwood, Medina, Gibson, McLemoresville, Tuckers Corner, Cades, New Enterprise, Ledbetter, Sitka, Vaughns Grove, Barrons Corner, Gann, Georgetown, Laneview, West and Fruitland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
